mapper.sql: CBPG01, CBPG02, CBPG03, CBPG04, CBPG05, CBPG06, CBPG07, CBPG08, CBPG09, CBPG10, CBPG11, CBPG12, CBPG13, CBPG14, CBPG15, CBPG16, CBPG17, user_id

mapper.update:
update `CBPG`
CBPG01 = #{record.cbpg01,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG02 = #{record.cbpg02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBPG03 = #{record.cbpg03,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update `CBPG` set CBPG01 = #{record.cbpg01,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG02 = #{record.cbpg02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG03 = #{record.cbpg03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG04 = #{record.cbpg04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG05 = #{record.cbpg05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG06 = #{record.cbpg06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG07 = #{record.cbpg07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBPG08 = #{record.cbpg08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG09 = #{record.cbpg09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG10 = #{record.cbpg10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG11 = #{record.cbpg11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG12 = #{record.cbpg12,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG13 = #{record.cbpg13,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG14 = #{record.cbpg14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG15 = #{record.cbpg15,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG16 = #{record.cbpg16,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG17 = #{record.cbpg17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update `CBPG`
CBPG02 = #{cbpg02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBPG03 = #{cbpg03,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG04 = #{cbpg04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBPG05 = #{cbpg05,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG06 = #{cbpg06,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG07 = #{cbpg07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CBPG08 = #{cbpg08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBPG09 = #{cbpg09,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG10 = #{cbpg10,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG11 = #{cbpg11,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG12 = #{cbpg12,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG13 = #{cbpg13,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBPG14 = #{cbpg14,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG15 = #{cbpg15,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBPG16 = #{cbpg16,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBPG17 = #{cbpg17,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where CBPG01 = #{cbpg01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update `CBPG` set CBPG02 = #{cbpg02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG03 = #{cbpg03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG04 = #{cbpg04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG05 = #{cbpg05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG06 = #{cbpg06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG07 = #{cbpg07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBPG08 = #{cbpg08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG09 = #{cbpg09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG10 = #{cbpg10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG11 = #{cbpg11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG12 = #{cbpg12,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG13 = #{cbpg13,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG14 = #{cbpg14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG15 = #{cbpg15,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBPG16 = #{cbpg16,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBPG17 = #{cbpg17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBPG01 = #{cbpg01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.CBPG01,a.CBPG07,a.CBPG09,a.CBPG08,c.CBSA08,d.CBWA09,e.CALA08,a.CBPG10,e.CALA01, h.CBPB08,h.CBPB12,b.CBPH09,b.CBPH10,b.CBPH11,b.CBPH13,h.CBPB15, i.CBLA09,b.CBPH08, f.CBPI01,f.CBPI02,f.CBPI03,f.CBPI08,f.CBPI09,f.CBPI10, m.CBPA08,b.CBPH01,n.CALA08 as pinpai from CBPG a LEFT JOIN CBPH b on a.CBPG01=b.CBPG01 LEFT JOIN CBSA c ON a.CBPG09=c.CBSA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA d on a.CBPG10=d.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA e on a.CBPG16=e.CALA01 left JOIN CBPI f on a.CBPG01=f.CBPG01 left join CBBA g on f.CBPI08=g.CBBA01 left join CBPB h on h.CBPB01=b.CBPH08 LEFT JOIN CBLA i ON i.CBLA01=f.CBPI10 left join CBPA m on m.CBPA01=h.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA n on n.CALA01=h.CBPB10 WHERE a.CBPG06=0 and a.CBPG01 = #{cbpg01} and d.cbwa09 = #{cbwa09}
and date_format(a.CBPG08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBPG08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
GROUP BY b.cbph08

SELECT a.CBPG01,a.CBPG07,a.CBPG08,c.CBSA08,d.CBWA09,e.CALA08,a.CBPG11
from CBPG a
LEFT JOIN CBSA c ON a.CBPG09=c.CBSA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA d on a.CBPG10=d.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA e on a.CBPG16=e.CALA01
WHERE a.CBPG06=0 order by a.CBPG08 desc

SELECT a.CBPG01,a.CBPG07,a.CBPG08,c.CBSA08,d.CBWA09,e.CALA08,a.CBPG11
from CBPG a
LEFT JOIN CBSA c ON a.CBPG09=c.CBSA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA d on a.CBPG10=d.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CALA e on a.CBPG16=e.CALA01
WHERE a.CBPG06=0 and a.CBPG11 like concat('%', #{cbpg11}, '%') and a.CBPG07 like concat('%', #{cbpg01}, '%') and a.CBPG07 like concat('%', #{cbpg07}, '%') and c.CBSA08 like concat('%', #{cbsa08}, '%') and d.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{cbwa09}, '%') and a.CBPG08 >= #{startTime} and a.CBPG08 <=#{endTime}
and date_format(a.CBPG08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBPG08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.CBPG08 desc
